summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Rezvo booking app iteration 4. All new features working correctly - legal pages (Privacy, Terms, Cookies), cookie consent popup, seed customers API, notifications API, short links API, error logging API. Fixed route ordering bug in /api/bookings/my endpoint. Backend 100% passing (20/20 tests). Frontend UI fully functional.
passed_tests: Get current user with valid token (/auth/me)
Seed customers endpoint (/api/seed/customers) - creates 10 dummy customers
My bookings endpoint (/api/bookings/my) - FIXED route ordering
Privacy page loads at /privacy with all sections
Terms page loads at /terms with all sections
Cookies page loads at /cookies with all sections
Cookie consent popup appears and buttons work (Accept All, Essential Only)
Login flow - form submission and redirect to dashboard
Dashboard sidebar shows all 7 menu items with teal icons
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features from iteration 4 tested and working. Legal pages (Privacy, Terms, Cookies) fully implemented with proper content. Cookie consent popup working with Accept All and Essential Only buttons. Fixed /api/bookings/my route ordering bug (was being matched as booking_id). All APIs live - no mocked endpoints. Test credentials: testuser@example.com / password123
fixes_applied: Fixed /api/bookings/my route ordering in server.py - moved the route definition BEFORE /api/bookings/{booking_id} to prevent 'my' being matched as a booking_id parameter

legal_pages.privacy: Working - /privacy loads with all GDPR sections
legal_pages.terms: Working - /terms loads with all T&C sections
legal_pages.cookies: Working - /cookies loads with cookie policy details

cookie_consent.accept_all: Working - stores consent in localStorage and dismisses popup

features_verified.notifications: Working - GET and POST endpoints functional
features_verified.short_links: Working - create and resolve endpoints functional
